mapper.select: select no, id, pw, name, email, phone, address, gender, birth, licenseno licenseNo, licensetype licenseType from users order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into dwv values ( TO_CHAR(#{startdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_CHAR(#{enddate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{splace}, #{eplace}, #{fare}, 1, #{people}, #{slate}, #{slng}, #{elat}, #{elng}, #{latlng}, #{dur}, #{dis}, #{introduce} )
